DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate effect treatment albiglutide cardiac repolarization ( correct QT interval ) healthy male female subject . Moxifloxacin , positive control , moxifloxacin placebo give order validate ability study detect change correct QT interval .
DOC.brief_title: Albiglutide Thorough ECG Study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , randomize , double-blind study design investigate effect treatment albiglutide give weekly 6 week cardiac repolarization ( correct QT interval ) healthy male female subject . Moxifloxacin , positive control , moxifloxacin placebo give order validate ability study detect change correct QT interval .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonpregnant , nonlactating female Subject consider good health judge absence clinically significant disease clinically significant abnormal laboratory value BMI ≥18 kg/m2 ≤30 kg/m2 Nonsmoker Positive test result hepatitis B , hepatitis C , human immunodeficiency virus History arrythmia use antiarrhythmic agent History anaphylactic reaction drug History significant cardiovascular pulmonary dysfunction Current chronic history liver disease , renal disease , CNS disorder , thyroid dysfunction , rheumatoid arthritis History alcohol substance abuse History GI surgery could influence gastric empty Female use oral contraception ( combine progestogen ) , implant levonorgestrel , injectable progesterone , hormone replacement therapy History pancreatitis
